name: Samurai Jack: The Amulet of Time
name_original: Samurai Jack: The Amulet of Time
description: Samurai Jack: The Amulet of Time is an action video game developed by Virtucraft and published by BAM! Entertainment for the Game Boy Advance. Based on the animated series Samurai Jack, the game came about after a licensing agreement deal was reached between Cartoon Network and BAM! Entertainment in January 2002. It was released worldwide on March 25, 2003.
